item.title: Help me
item.dc:creator: @bluurr bluurr
item.description:
@bluurr wrote:

find


	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("servermenu"))
	{
		
		ServerHelpMenu();	
	}

below add

	else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands"))
	{
		
		commandsMenu();	
	}

then find

	public void ServerHelpMenu()
	{

					sendQuest("@dre@Server Information Menu", 8144);  //Title
					clearQuestInterface();
					sendQuest("@dbl@Server Information", 8145);
					sendQuest("@dbl@Server IP: @gre@"+"xlinescape.no-ip.info", 8147);
					sendQuest("@dbl@Players Online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8148);
				        sendQuest("@dbl@Server Hoster And Creator: @dre@"+"bluurr", 8149);
                                        sendQuest("@dbl@Server Admins: @dbl@"+" bluurr, superdude, ....", 8150);
				        sendQuest(" ", 8151);
				        sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@"+" ---", 8152);
				        sendQuest("@dbl@WebSite: @red@"+"www.xinescape.co.nr", 8153);
				       	sendQuestSomething(8143);
					showInterface(8134);
					flushOutStream();
		
				}

below add

	public void commandsMenu()
	{

					sendQuest("@dre@commandsmenu", 8144);  //Title
					clearQuestInterface();
				    sendQuest("@dre@commands Menu", 8145);
				    sendQuest("txt you want here, 8148);
				    sendQuest("txt you want here", 8149);
					sendQuest("txt you want here", 8150);
					sendQuest("txt you want here", 8151);
					sendQuest("txt you want here", 8153);
					sendQuest("txt you want here", 8154);
					sendQuest("txt you want here", 8155);
					sendQuestSomething(8143);
					showInterface(8134);
					flushOutStream();
	}

change the txt to what you want it to say then compiler and your done

to add more lines do

sendQuest("txt you want here", 8156);
sendQuest("txt you want here", 8157);

and so on

Read full topic
